summary:
Bub and his friends seem to have found themselves lost in a strange new world! Everything is so familiar, yet so different! Will you be able to help Bub and his friends find their way home?

Welcome to "Bub's Big Blowout!", A 3D reimagining of the Bubble Bobble arcade game! Here you can jump, blow bubbles, and burst baddies as bub or one of his 3 friends! Collect fruit, Extend Bubbles, and other collectibles for the best possible score!
